Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AgentThe base class for all agents, that can be rioters or police
BaseGameEntityThe base class for all entities in the game, static or moving
Cell
CellGraph
EntityManagerA manager monostate class that stores all base game entities with a corresponding ID number
FontCharStructure to hold the font char texture id and the vao. The vao for each font will be a different size need to investigate is a scale would be quicker / more efficient than storing multiple billboards (some will be the same size)
GameWorldThe class that creates the world an encompasses all base game entities
MessageA struct used to store message information so it can be sent from one entity to another
MessageManagerA manager monostate class that helps handle the sending and receiving of messages between entities
MovingThe base class for all moving entities
MovingEntity
NGLDrawControls drawing and updating all entities in the game and any UI elements
PoliceThe base class for all policemen
RioterThe base class for all rioters
SquadThe class to define a squad of policemen
StateMachine< entityType >Templated scripted FSM to make agent decisions linked using LuaBridge
StaticEntityThe base class for all static entities
SteeringThe class to contain all steering behaviours and avoidance
SteeringBehaviour
Text
TimerA monostate class that contains all the time information to be used throughout the game
UIButtonA simple button class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes
UISliderA simple slider class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes
VehicleThe base class for all vehicles
WallWall structure containing the start, end and normal of the wall
